data.name: inRun Demo
data.description:
inRun is a racing game that opens a portal to the past, evoking the golden age of arcades while using the most innovative technology.
Race against time and the legacy of Jason, your partner's father, to beat his inRun record and earn his respect. The ultimate goal? To secure his blessing to marry the love of your life. Are you up for the challenge?
Rediscover the thrill of the race with inRun. Leave your mark on the tracks and take on the legacy. The race for love and respect starts now!

FEATURES:
- Enjoy a motion sickness-free VR driving experience using the state-of-the-art anti-rotation system.
- Skip the wait: jump straight into the action with zero load times.
- Connect with players worldwide thanks to the groundbreaking cross-platform multiplayer system. You'll never play alone!
- Show off your style with 17 customizable cars.
- Take a nostalgic journey through arcade history, combined with the latest gameplay technology.
- A scalable arcade driving experience that adapts to your skill level.
- Amazing soundtrack featuring over 30 songs that will immerse you in the thrill of the race.
